Articles.Content:
Episode 3 of my series, following the missions and story of a corporation. Thanks for watching and would love feedback! Check out Episode 1 and 2 first if you haven't already!

Horizon reacts to the attack on the Exodus Lab. They build a defensive craft to help protect the creation of the New Mobile Station, but when it is sent up they get a radar reading that sparks the start of it all.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8ax0y39iJY
